name: NuPhy Air75 V2
description: Ultra-slim 75% mechanical keyboard with low-profile Gateron switches. Features RGB backlighting, triple connectivity, and unique colorful aesthetic. Perfect for Mac and Windows.

reviews.review_text: Low profile done right. Feels like typing on a MacBook but better.
The colorful keycaps are surprisingly nice.
Good board but switches are not as tactile as full-height.
